metadata.name: The Trough of Disillusionment
metadata.description:
We all know this feeling when the world and its new technologies feel like they are closing in on us. The original was created with ink and collage. The heavy ink splatters are typical of Steadman's signature style and he often lets the ink determine the direction a picture will take.

"There is no such thing as a mistake. A mistake is an opportunity to do something else."
Ralph Steadman
